name: Talengo Sprecago
description:
It's a 2D sidescrolling platformer where you try to reach the end of the level. You attack these sharp black goops with a stick.

Controls:

Key A / Left Arrow - Move Left

Key D / Right Arrow - Move Right

Key P / Z - Jump

Key O / X - Attack

Credits:

Programming - @UncannyMario01

Sprite Artist - OneHourofSleep

Music Artist - @UncannyMario01
